body_html:
ok. i think ur right, just need a tf.cond or something similar in the
mask_function right? and then use that to generate the mask?

William Chan

On Tue, Apr 26, 2016 at 11:15 PM, William Chan williamchan@cmu.edu wrote:

sorry, didnt quite catch the last step:

you'd just provide mask_function(_, i) = length-tensor[i]

how does "length - tensor[i]" generate the mask? length is a tensor of the
sample length? and tensor[i] is what? and doesn't this result in a scalar
not a mask?

thanks!

body:
ok. i think ur right, just need a tf.cond or something similar in the
mask_function right? and then use that to generate the mask?

## 

William Chan
Carnegie Mellon University
